thread.title: Americans' debt level rises in fourth quarter

title: Americans' debt level rises in fourth quarter

organizations.name: federal reserve bank of new york

text: February 13, 2018 / 4:04 PM / in 15 minutes Americans' debt level rises in fourth quarter Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Americansâ€™ debt level rose during the fourth quarter, driven by an increase in mortgage loans, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of New York report published on Tuesday. Total U.S. household debt was $13.15 trillion in the three months to December, up $193 billion from the prior three months. Debt levels were $402 billion higher than during the fourth quarter of 2016. The proportion of overall debt that was 90 days delinquent or more fell slightly to 2.3 percent from 2.4 percent. Reporting by Jason Lange in WashingtonEditing by Chizu Nomiyama
